parameter.value:
<script>
  
function setGDPRParam() {
    try {
      var urlParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);
      var gdpr = urlParams.get("gdpr") || "allow";
      if (gdpr == 'null') {var gdpr = "allow"};
      window.localStorage.setItem("gdpr", gdpr);
      return { error: null };
    } catch(e) {
      return { error: 'localstorage disabled' }
    }
  };

setGDPRParam();
  
</script>

<script>
function historyChange() {
  var init = {{DLV - Init}};
  if (init == "true") {
    dataLayer.push({
      event: 'init',
      init: false
    });
  }
};

historyChange();
</script>

<script> 
function getGDPRParam() {
    try {
      return { value: window.localStorage.getItem("gdpr"), error: null };
    } catch(e) {
      return { value: null, error: e };
    }
  }

function GDPRPreference() {
    var host = document.location.hostname
    var regex = '^checkout.*$'
    if (host.match(regex) == null ) {
        console.log('delegating to cookiebot')
        return;
    }
    try {
        var gdpr = getGDPRParam().value
        if (gdpr == 'allow') {
            dataLayer.push({
                event: 'allow.cookies',
                allowCookies: true
            })
        }
        else if (gdpr == 'null') {
            dataLayer.push({
                event: 'allow.cookies',
                allowCookies: true
            })
        }
        else if (gdpr == 'deny') {
            dataLayer.push({
                event: 'deny.cookies',
                allowCookies: false
            })
        }
    } catch (err) { // fail "open"
        dataLayer.push({
            event: 'allow.cookies',
            allowCookies: true
        })
    }
};
  
GDPRPreference()
</script>

<script>
dl = location.pathname
pageTypes = [
    'home',
    'category',
    'product',
    'searchresults',
    'cart',
    'checkout',
    'purchase',
    'account',
    'other'
]
regexSearch = [
    '/$',
    '/collections.*',
    '/products.*',
    '/search.*',
    '/cart.*',
    '/checkouts.*',
    '/thank_you.*',
    '/account.*',
    '.*'
]
for (i = 0; i < pageTypes.length; i++) {
    pageType = pageTypes[i]
    test = dl.match(regexSearch[i])
    try {
        test = test[0] == null
        if (test === false) {
            break;
        }
    } catch (err) {
        {
            continue;
        }
    };
}
pageType = pageType.trim()
if (pageType === 'home') {
    dataLayer.push({
        'event': 'HomeView',
        'pageType': pageType
    });
} else {
    dataLayer.push({
        'event': 'OtherView',
        'pageType': pageType
    });
}
</script>
